titles.title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to valid scientific evidence.
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to valid scientific evidence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary: This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to define “valid scientific evidence” to include well-documented case histories or studies published in peer-reviewed journals for purposes of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) determining the effectiveness of a medical device without clinical investigation. Under specified conditions, the FDA may request the data underlying a study that is offered as valid scientific evidence.
